#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int N, a[100001];
int main()
{
	scanf("%d", &N);
	assert((N > 0) && (N <= 100000));
	for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		assert((a[i] >= 0) && (a[i] <= 1000000));
	}
	sort(a, a + N);
	if(N % 2)
		printf("%d\n", a[N/2]);
	else
		printf("%d\n", a[N/2 - 1]);
	return 0;
}
